other_title: Die Abenteuer des phantastischen Weltraumpiraten Captain Harlock (German)
宇宙海賊キャプテンハーロック (Japanese)
plot: The year is 2977. Mankind has become complacent and stagnant. All work is done by machines, while humans spend all their time on entertainment. But when a mysterious invader from the stars catches Earth unawares, only the legendary space pirate Captain Harlock and the crew of the Arcadia have the will to stand against them.
